metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Impactful content: You can use the content suggestions that the features generate for

1. Select the hamburger menu (Windows®), or go to Acrobat (macOS)> Preferences. 2. In the Preferences dialog box, from under categories, select Signatures. 3. From the Verification box in the Digital Signatures panel, select More...
If you don't want to use the More Options, skip the next optional step. 4. (Optional) Click More Options, if you want to specify advanced options, such as signer
Show annotations and drawing markup tools

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Indicate response You can choose to like, dislike, or report the generated response
From the Verification box in the Digital Signatures panel, select More..
(Optional) Click More Options, if you want to specify advanced options, such as signer authentication, reminders, and more
Note: To delete a drawing markup, select it and press Delete
It could be a paper form or PDF that hasn’t been optimized for form filling
